name: Trustedbookings
overview:
Trustedbookings provides and online booking system for small business, giving them the opportunity to receive online bookings on there own website with credit card payments.

Some of the features:

  • Online Bookings + Credit Card payments
  • Voucher Codes (Use for returning customers, special offers, measure your marketing campaigns)
  • Special Offers (Helps your selling beds faster)
  • Request Payments (Like having your own POS terminal)
  • Manual Bookings (Payment control, Payment reminders)
  • Travel Agent accounts (Give your travel agents the option to book-in there own customers)
  • Automated Emails (Once customer has left or booked send custom E-Mails at different stages)
  • Users (Setup users with different rights)
  • 24/7 (Your business is now open 24/7 without working more)
  • White label integration (Looks like it would be yours)
